author: System Admin

name: Ticket Management
content:
# Ticket Management

This section covers everything you need to know about creating, managing, and resolving support tickets in nosDesk.

## Key Ticket Features

- Create and assign tickets
- Set priorities and due dates
- Track ticket status
- Add comments and attachments
- Link tickets to knowledge base articles

## Best Practices

- Use clear, descriptive titles
- Include all relevant information in the description
- Assign appropriate priority levels
- Update ticket status as you work
- Document resolution steps

Effective ticket management is essential for providing excellent customer support and maintaining a record of issues and their resolutions.
author: Support Team

name: Documentation Guide
content:
# Documentation Guide

This section explains how to create, organize, and maintain documentation in nosDesk.

## Documentation Features

- Markdown formatting
- File attachments
- Version history
- Categorization
- Search functionality

## Writing Effective Documentation

- Use clear, concise language
- Include step-by-step instructions
- Add screenshots or diagrams when helpful
- Organize content with headings
- Link related articles

Well-maintained documentation reduces support requests and helps users solve problems independently.
author: Documentation Team
